page.title: 17Trade Droxford Pubs Guests
page.content: 3 Pubs in 12km.sq.2 in{Droxford White {Horse Inn}Famous for beer 6x most popular.New owners have been there 5 months and have spruced it up.They sell about 100pts a week supplied by lots of brewers.New children's room planned.Bar food,restaurant re_opens Autumn.Has 2 guest rooms.{Bakers Arms also a Freehouse,Lager and Guinness big sellers.Has a football team.Little Uplands Motel sleeps 27 on av. 100 guests weekly all year round staying 2_4 days.Most from UK. some foreign 40% families others Single.Many on holiday.These are all on A32. {The Hurdles}is across the river opposite old station.French and German children stay with families during holidays.No camping or caravan sites
